# Canny Effort (Spell)
## Overview
[[Divination Spells|Divination]]

**Level: [[0 Level Bard Spells|Bard 0]]**, [[0 Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 0]], [[0 Level Druid Spells|Druid 0]], [[0 Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 0]], [[0 Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 0]]

**BoXM: [[BoXM 1st-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 1]]**, [[BoXM 1st-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 1]], [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** See text

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** 1001 Spells (Rite Publishing), pg. 62

Your next single skill check (if it is made before the end of the next round) gains a +2 insight bonus.
